knimeNode.name: Spacy Morphologizer
knimeNode.shortDescription: The node performs morphology analysis of the text and assigns the tags for singular/plural, gender, case, conjugation, animacy, etc. for the tokens.

fullDescription.intro: The node performs morphology analysis of the text and assigns the tags for singular/plural, gender, case, conjugation, animacy, etc. for the tokens. Different spaCy models might have different tag sets. Different spaCy models might lack this model.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Select a Document column that will be affected by morphologizer.
If checked, the document column will be replaced by the new preprocessed documents. Otherwise the preprocessed documents will be appended as a new column.
The name of the new appended column, containing the preprocessed documents.

tab.name: Model
tab.option: Pick one of the official spaCy models, or refer to a custom model stored in the filesystem. In the latter case refer to a folder with meta.json and config files.
